column2: Complete the sentences, active or passive, present or past.
column3:
Water {{c1::covers}} (cover) most of the earth's surface.

How much of the earth's surface {{c1::is covered}} (cover) by water?

column2: Complete the sentences, active or passive, present or past.
column3:
I was born in London, but I {{c1::grew}} (grow) up in Canada.

I was born in London, but I {{c1::was brought}} (bring) up in Canada.

column2: Complete the sentences, active or passive, present or past.
column3:
How did you hurt yourself? {{c1::Did you fall}} (you / fall) off your bike?

How did you hurt yourself? {{c1::Were you knocked}} (you / knock) off your bike?

column2: Complete the sentences, active or passive, present or past.
column3:
Sometimes it's noisy here, but it's not a problem. {{c1::I'm not bothered}} (I / not / bother) by it.

Sometimes it's noisy here, but it's not a problem. {{c1::It doesn't bother}} (It / not / bother) me.

column2: Complete the sentences, active or passive, present or past.
column3:
There was a strike at the airport, but it {{c1::didn't affect}} (not / affect) us.

There was a strike at the airport, but we {{c1::weren't affected}} (not / affect).
